title: Ep 001: Wine Varietals vs. Varieties - Which is correct?
itunes:title: Wine Varietals vs. Varieties - Which is correct?
description:
Elizabeth and Rick discuss some confusing wine terminology and set the record straight.

Show Notes:

A new podcast!

  • What’s it all about?
  • Which term is correct?
  • Varietal or variety (of wine) It’s all about the grapes Naming conventions for wines across the world
  • Difference between New World and Old World wines
  • Blending wines and grape characteristics
  • Making fun of confusing wine pronunciations It’s mer-a-TIJ not mer-a-TAHJ

 

Sponsored by the free Hello Vino mobile app (iPhone & Android) More at the Wine for Normal People blog.
